Html:
Hi to all,

I would like to create a calendar to feed with data contained in my database.

I know how to put data in my cells from database, but I would like to know if someone has a little php script sample to help me to create a year calendar.

 

Thanks

Hi,

I have just today seen the PHPExcel Package and so I have no example, but I have a working (formula based) calendar in Excel where the only input required is the year in cell A1. The rest is filled by formulae.

 

If you would like to have that workbook, contact me.

 

BR

Georg
